content: fingers or a tapestry needle thread the chain through the n mesh stitches alternating between a under and over the vertical bars e j page 11 jeanne crochets repeat the process with the other chain starting on the other side s t e h it should look c like this o tie the ends of r the chains on c the same side together e n weave in the n ends and your a little pouch is e finished j i hope you enjoyed this little pattern don t hesitate to tag me on instagram @jeanne crochets so i can see your beautiful creations if you liked this pattern make sure to check the other ones i have you can find them on etsy ravelry or ko-fi page 12 jeanne crochets
